Text: RE coal and gas calculations Cc As for Fuel Oil it doesnt seem to be working to hold the switching demand like we thought it would Prices are coming off but with Natty not moving much in the past few days it has made little effect On Mon seeing FPL selling almost bbls of NYh in Aug and Sep Mirant has been out the whole week buying and the utilities are also long Cal Cal but have yet to dump it Seeing utilities switch in the NYC region even though prices are slowly coming off Woudl expect if you get heat to see some utilities use their storage and burn some fuel but unless Natty goes back up to ish I think we may be off the mrkt for a little bit here Watchign for signs that may come back on after summer Additional issue being that demand as a whole is very weak so even wo Natty at such low levels we would be just a weak As of tonight NYH Jul bbl wo taxes and transport right off the barge Original Message From Fraser Jennifer Sent Thursday July PM To Arnold John Cc Mulholland Sarah Subject coal and gas calculations coal EAST t freight btulb therefore MMBTU heat rate therfore MWH nagural gas NYMEX most efficient new gen heat rate therefore mwh all back of the envelopebut when we get heat will gens increase coal push limitsor will gas become more of the baseload
